group_1.textCenter: A [textBlue:Rumor] from the past came in through Mirrors?!

group_1.textLeft: ...Wait, does that mean there's no more party?!
What was the point of practicin' all our tricks?!

group_1.textRight: M-more importantly...@Tsuruno and the others are in trouble...!
Hey, Sis, if this is because of a [textBlue:Rumor]...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, they could be trapped in the Uwasa's@Labyrinth...

group_1.textRight: That's correct!
In short, you Magius are to blame for this as well,@aren't you...?!
Was it part of your goal to use the [textBlue:Rumor] to get rid@of Hikaru?
You better give us back our Horse before we kill you.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm?@You're all purr-etty stupid, aren't you?
Even our own friends have been affected by this.
If you used your head, wouldn't you realize that@would be a dumb strategy?

group_1.textRight: You little bitch!

group_1.textLeft: I've done what I can, but I can't bring anyone back.
Now that we know the cause of the problem, we'll@have to work together to solve it.
...You mean you've already figured out the solution?

group_1.textRight: Naturally!
An Uwasa from the past came in through Mirrors.
We need to go to the terminal in Endless Mirrors...
...and break the mirror responsible for this.

group_1.textLeft: So something can affect the past or future by@coming in through a mirror,
but if that mirror is broken, it'll be like a daydream@that never actually happened.

group_1.textRight: Right again!
If that's how it is, let's go break it right now!
Where might this mirror be?

group_1.textLeft: We're in the middle of investigating that!

group_1.textRight: Eh?!

group_1.textLeft: There are a LOT of mirrors in the terminal.
It's very difficult to find the specific one that's@causing the problem.
However, if we can pick up on the magic power@going from mirror to mirror,
we'll be able to pin down the source.
That's why I've just sent Mifuyu off to the terminal.
She'll be watching carefully as Kanagi enters the@Mirrors offshoot by Suitoku Temple...
...connected to the Kamihama City of the past.
If we can pick up on the magic energy in the@terminal at the moment Kanagi makes her move,
our mirror is as good as found!
However, it will take some time to figure this out.

group_1.textRight: If what you're saying is true, then I guess there's@no need to panic.
Breaking the mirror will return everything to@normal, and this will all seem like a daydream...
I don't get why you're makin' such a big deal@outta this.
We can just go to the Mirrors terminal and offshoot@ourselves, right?

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't be so optimistic, you know.

group_1.textRight: Why not?

group_1.textLeft: First off, there are SO many mirrors in the terminal.
They're constantly shifting, and never stay@in one place.
That's why we're going in through the Mirrors@offshoot that's connected to the past and present.
Plus, even if we pick up a magic response at the@terminal,
we could end up breaking the wrong mirror.@It's not that easy.

group_1.textRight: Even if it takes a long time, though, would it not be@better to start destroying them?

group_1.textLeft: Touka isn't concerned about how long it would take@to destroy the mirrors.
It's the amount of time that everyone will remain@trapped by the [textBlue:Rumor] that's the problem.
Back then, I had created a number of dangerous@[textBlue:Rumors]— things one couldn't begin to imagine—
to shake people's emotions and harvest energy@from them.
If one were to remain trapped in it for a long time,@I am unsure how it would affect them.
We need to take a multifaceted approach to this.
Even if the events become nothing but daydreams,@the memories will still be etched into our minds.

group_1.textRight: ...I am embarrassed to admit I hadn't fully grasped@the gravity of this situation.
Sis...

group_1.textLeft: I guess we'll have to go to the Uwasa's Labyrinth,@huh?

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: Other than breaking the mirror,
the only way to save everyone is to defeat@the [textBlue:Rumor] itself.

group_1.textRight: Correct once more!@I'd expect no less from you, Big Sis!
We of the Tokime Clan are in favor of this idea@as well.
Let's go save Sunao and the others!
We will come too.

group_1.textLeft: That settles it, then.@But don't rush in blindly, everyone.

group_1.textRight: Even Tsuruno, who's fought against Uwasa before,@is struggling with this one...

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.
I'm sure she's caught on that it's a [textBlue:Rumor],
but she still can't get out, which means...

group_1.textRight: Even Tsuruno is having a hard time beating it...?

group_1.textLeft: If it's that strong of an Uwasa, I'd like to find a way@to settle it down...

group_1.textRight: The contents of the Kamihama Rumor Files said...

group_1.narration: Only those who make it into the joyous celebration@will receive words of appreciation@and be welcomed into the banquet of the Pure Land.
But if you join in, watch out!
If you fail the test,@you'll be dragged down to the underworld!@It's a rumor that's spreading through@ALL the priests of the temple!

group_1.textLeft: If we're going to settle this peacefully,
we'll have to be able to say that we can make@the banquet fun...
I'm not really sure how to go about doing that...

group_1.textRight: Huh? Whaddaya mean?

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: We worked super hard, didn't we?
Practicin' our party tricks!

group_1.textLeft: Ah!

group_1.textRight: That's right! We've perfected our act for the@banquet too!
We've also gotten ours good to go~.

group_1.textLeft: Right... Well, everyone...
Let's get this party started!

group_1.textRight: ...Oh yeah, what do you mean by "words of@appreciation"?
Callin' us all of a sudden...@I thought the party was cancelled?

group_1.textLeft: It was, but... For some reason, I have a bad feeling@about it...

group_1.textRight: If Madoka says so, then there must be something@wrong...
Maybe the reason the party was cancelled was@because some kind of trouble came up...
I don't wanna regret it if something happens to you.@I'll come too, Madoka!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, thank you.
Okay, now let's get going to Kamihama City!
